text_block_list.name: Narrator
text_block_list.text: Uma Musume presents a new TCG, Uma Duel Racers! In this brand new game, you can collect cards of Uma Musume around the world and become a champion yourself!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: They're hosting a card game here for the game too! Hehe, doesn't it sound fun?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: It really does! I just bought myself a new deck, so it'll be a great chance for me to play.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: It's so like you to have us come to a tournament so soon after starting the game.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Satono! We're going to be rival duelers today! If we face each other, we've gotta go all out!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: The Uma Duel Racers morning tournament will now begin. Our contestants will be—

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Nature! The winner gets a year's supply of carrot chips. If I win I'll share some with you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah yeah, I believe in you.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I looost!!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Card games sure are difficult… I wish I could've won more with the McQueen deck.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Hey, Dia… they're still allowing people to register for the afternoon tournament. Mind if I borrow your deck?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: That's fine, but… are you really going register?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You're gonna enter?! Wait, but didn't you just recently find out about this game?

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I pretty much figured it all out from Dia and Turbo's duel, so don't worry about that. I'm going to avenge you two!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: Dia, I'll show you how powerful your deck really is. I'm confident♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I summon Uma Musume: Mejiro McQueen! I then activate my tactical card, Noble Obligation! And that's Goal!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: It's finished! The duel is over! The winner is Satono Crown! She finished with over 1 billion Race Points!! She's the undisputed champion!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Crown is so amazing!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: She actually managed to win? I guess rich smart girls shouldn't be underestimated, huh?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Yup♪ Crown's always been like this. She grows stronger in the face of adversity.

text_block_list.name: Fanboy
text_block_list.text: That duel was incredible! How do I become as good a duel racer as you?!

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: It's better to learn by doing rather than having it told to you. Wanna duel me?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ooh, a champion faces against a future competitor… what a great story.

text_block_list.name: Satono Crown
text_block_list.text: I lost…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Really?! After all that?! Are you cursed to never win matches you absolutely should be winning?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: H-Hey! Cheer up! At least you've got a bunch of carrot chips now!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Wh-what I do is none of your business, so don't worry about it, okay?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: I said it's fine. Just… leave me alone. We'll talk later.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Haa… I guess I'll go do some fishing.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: I may have said that to Sis, but maybe \Nshe has a point. I haven't done what I can…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Maybe I should be doing more joint training sessions or something. Well, even if I wanted to, I have no friends to do it with…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Is that you, Cheval-chan?! What a coincidence! I came to do some fishing with the upper classmen!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: She ended up dragging me into this too…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Aagh! Why can't I fish up anything?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Nngh… When I came with Sei-chan, we managed to catch a lot of fish. Why can't we catch any today…?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: The way they move their rod is- No, someone like me shouldn't say something so rude to members of the Golden Generation of Uma Musume…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: I think I've got it! Teio-san, Spe-san, you shouldn't move your rods so much!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Woah… Kita-san doesn't seem intimidated whatsoever by them… if only I was like her…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Cheval-chan! What else do you think they should be doing?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wh-Why're you asking me?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Well you looked like a real pro when you casted your rod earlier!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I agree! Your movements looked so refined, like you've done this many times! I'd love to hear some tips from you.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: N-No, I think you girls have the wrong—

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Woah♪ As soon as we did what you said, we started catching loads of fish! You're incredible!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: What a great haul♪ Cheval, you're amazing! A true fishing genius!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Th-That's not true… not one bit…

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Trust us, you're really amazing! Thanks for today! Let's go fishing together again sometime.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Dia-chan, I'm home♪

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Welcome home, Kita-chan♪

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: Thanks to my friends, today was a lot of fun.
